verses.verse: וַיִּסַּ֤ע <S%H5265><s%> took his journey יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And Israel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֔וֹ וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> with all that he had and came בְּאֵ֣רָה שָּׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> to Beersheba וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> and offered זְבָחִ֔ים <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> unto the God אָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> of his father יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> Isaac

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And God לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel בְּמַרְאֹ֣ת <S%H4759><s%> in the visions הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of the night וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said יַעֲקֹ֣ב ׀ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I הָאֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> I [am] God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> fear מֵרְדָ֣ה <S%H3381><s%> not to go down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of thee a great אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֥ <S%H7760><s%> for I will there make שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I אֵרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> I will go down עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> you מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> with thee into Egypt וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אַֽעַלְךָ֣ <S%H5927><s%> and I will also surely גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also עָלֹ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> bring thee up וְיוֹסֵ֕ף <S%H3130><s%> [again] and Joseph יָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> shall put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> upon thine eyes

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> from Beersheba וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> carried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> their father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טַפָּם֙ <S%H2945><s%> and their little ones וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> and their wives בָּעֲגָל֕וֹת <S%H5699><s%> in the wagons אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> had sent פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> which Pharaoh לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> to carry אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4735><s%> their cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְכוּשָׁם֙ <S%H7399><s%> and their goods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which רָֽכְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7408><s%> which they had gotten בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all זַרְע֥וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and all his seed אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

בָּנָ֞יו <S%H1121><s%> His sons וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> sons אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֹתָ֛יו <S%H1323><s%> with him his daughters וּבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and all his seed הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> brought he אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> with him into Egypt ס

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these שְׁמ֧וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַבָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> which came מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וּבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons בְּכֹ֥ר <S%H1060><s%> firstborn יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> Reuben

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben חֲנ֥וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <S%H6396><s%> and Phallu וְחֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> and Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3756><s%> and Carmi

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֧ל <S%H3223><s%> Jemuel וְיָמִ֛ין <S%H3226><s%> and Jamin וְאֹ֖הַד <S%H161><s%> and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <S%H3199><s%> and Jachin וְצֹ֑חַר <S%H6714><s%> and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Shaul בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽית׃ <S%H3669><s%> of a Canaanitish
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <S%H1648><s%> Gershon קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> and Merari

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֵ֧ר <S%H6147><s%> Er וְאוֹנָ֛ן <S%H209><s%> and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֖ה <S%H7956><s%> and Shelah וָפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> and Pharez וָזָ֑רַח <S%H2226><s%> and Zerah וַיָּ֨מָת <S%H4191><s%> died עֵ֤ר <S%H6147><s%> but Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <S%H209><s%> and Onan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons פֶ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> were Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <S%H2538><s%> and Hamul

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar תּוֹלָ֥ע <S%H8439><s%> Tola וּפֻוָּ֖ה <S%H6312><s%> and Phuvah וְי֥וֹב <S%H3102><s%> and Job וְשִׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8110><s%> and Shimron
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons זְבוּלֻ֑ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun סֶ֥רֶד <S%H5624><s%> Sered וְאֵל֖וֹן <S%H356><s%> and Elon וְיַחְלְאֵֽל׃ <S%H3177><s%> and Jahleel

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [be] the sons לֵאָ֗ה <S%H3812><s%> of Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָֽלְדָ֤ה <S%H3205><s%> which she bare לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob בְּפַדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֔ם <S%H6307><s%> in Padanaram וְאֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> for דִּינָ֣ה <S%H1783><s%> Dinah בִתּ֑וֹ <S%H1323><s%> with his daughter כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נֶ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> all the souls בָּנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons וּבְנוֹתָ֖יו <S%H1323><s%> and his daughters שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> [were] thirty וְשָׁלֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H7969><s%> and three

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad צִפְי֥וֹן <S%H6837><s%> Ziphion וְחַגִּ֖י <S%H2291><s%> and Haggi שׁוּנִ֣י <S%H7764><s%> Shuni וְאֶצְבֹּ֑ן <S%H675><s%> and Ezbon עֵרִ֥י <S%H6179><s%> Eri וַֽאֲרוֹדִ֖י <S%H722><s%> and Arodi וְאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H692><s%> and Areli

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אָשֵׁ֗ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher יִמְנָ֧ה <S%H3232><s%> Jimnah וְיִשְׁוָ֛ה <S%H3438><s%> and Ishuah וְיִשְׁוִ֥י <S%H3440><s%> and Isui וּבְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H1283><s%> and Beriah וְשֶׂ֣רַח <S%H8294><s%> and Serah אֲחֹתָ֑ם <S%H269><s%> their sister וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons בְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H1283><s%> of Beriah חֶ֖בֶר <S%H2268><s%> Heber וּמַלְכִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H4439><s%> and Malchiel

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons זִלְפָּ֔ה <S%H2153><s%> of Zilpah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> whom Laban לְלֵאָ֣ה <S%H3812><s%> to Leah בִתּ֑וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter וַתֵּ֤לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and these she bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> souls
בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> The sons רָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> of Rachel אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin

וַיִּוָּלֵ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> were born לְיוֹסֵף֮ <S%H3130><s%> And unto Joseph בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָֽלְדָה־ <S%H3205><s%> bare לּוֹ֙ אָֽסְנַ֔ת <S%H621><s%> which Asenath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter פּ֥וֹטִי פֶ֖רַע <S%H6319><s%> of Potipherah כֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest אֹ֑ן <S%H204><s%> of On אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons בִנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin בֶּ֤לַע <S%H1106><s%> [were] Belah וָבֶ֙כֶר֙ <S%H1071><s%> and Becher וְאַשְׁבֵּ֔ל <S%H788><s%> and Ashbel גֵּרָ֥א <S%H1617><s%> Gera וְנַעֲמָ֖ן <S%H5283><s%> and Naaman אֵחִ֣י <S%H278><s%> Ehi וָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7220><s%> and Rosh מֻפִּ֥ים <S%H4649><s%> Muppim וְחֻפִּ֖ים <S%H2650><s%> and Huppim וָאָֽרְדְּ׃ <S%H714><s%> and Ard

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> of Rachel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> which were born לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> to Jacob כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> all the souls אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen
וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons דָ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan חֻשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2366><s%> Hushim

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali יַחְצְאֵ֥ל <S%H3183><s%> Jahzeel וְגוּנִ֖י <S%H1476><s%> and Guni וְיֵ֥צֶר <S%H3337><s%> and Jezer וְשִׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H8006><s%> and Shillem

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons בִלְהָ֔ה <S%H1090><s%> of Bilhah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> which Laban לְרָחֵ֣ל <S%H7354><s%> unto Rachel בִּתּ֑וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter וַתֵּ֧לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> these unto Jacob כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> all the souls שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> [were] seven

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֠נֶּפֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> All the souls הַבָּאָ֨ה <S%H935><s%> that came לְיַעֲקֹ֤ב <S%H3290><s%> with Jacob מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt יֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> which came out יְרֵכ֔וֹ <S%H3409><s%> of his loins מִלְּבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> including נְשֵׁ֣י <S%H802><s%> wives בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons' יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> besides Jacob's כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> all the souls שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> [were] threescore וָשֵֽׁשׁ׃ <S%H8337><s%> and six

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> which were born ל֥וֹ בְמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> him in Egypt נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> souls שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> [were] two כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> all the souls לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob הַבָּ֥אָה <S%H935><s%> which came מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt שִׁבְעִֽים׃ <S%H7657><s%> [were] threescore and ten פ

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֞ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before him אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph לְהוֹרֹ֥ת <S%H3384><s%> to direct לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face גֹּ֑שְׁנָה <S%H1657><s%> unto Goshen וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> into the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen

וַיֶּאְסֹ֤ר <S%H631><s%> made ready יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph מֶרְכַּבְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4818><s%> his chariot וַיַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up לִקְרַֽאת־ <S%H7125><s%> to meet יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father גֹּ֑שְׁנָה <S%H1657><s%> to Goshen וַיֵּרָ֣א <S%H7200><s%> and presented אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> before וַיִּפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> himself unto him and he fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַוָּארָ֔יו <S%H6677><s%> on his neck וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַוָּארָ֖יו <S%H6677><s%> on his neck עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> a good while

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph אָמ֣וּתָה <S%H4191><s%> let me die הַפָּ֑עַם <S%H6471><s%> Now אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> since רְאוֹתִ֣י <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that עוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H5750><s%> because thou [art] yet חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> alive

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> and unto his father's אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> I will go up וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> and shew לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וְאֹֽמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אַחַ֧י <S%H251><s%> unto him My brethren וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֛י <S%H1><s%> and my father's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> which [were] in the land כְּנַ֖עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> and to

וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> And the men רֹ֣עֵי <S%H7462><s%> are shepherds צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> their flocks כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> another מִקְנֶ֖ה <S%H4735><s%> for their trade hath been to feed cattle הָי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> have been וְצֹאנָ֧ם <S%H6629><s%> their flocks וּבְקָרָ֛ם <S%H1241><s%> and their herds וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לָהֶ֖ם הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> and they have brought

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> shall call לָכֶ֖ם פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> And it shall come to pass when Pharaoh וְאָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> you and shall say מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> act

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H559><s%> That ye shall say אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H582><s%> trade מִקְנֶ֜ה <S%H4735><s%> hath been about cattle הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> have been עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servants' מִנְּעוּרֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5271><s%> from our youth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> even until now both we [and] also our fathers בַּעֲב֗וּר <S%H5668><s%> because of תֵּשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> that ye may dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תוֹעֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] an abomination מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every רֹ֥עֵה <S%H7462><s%> shepherd צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> cattle
